scenarios.name: Trust chain break during package install
scenarios.invariant: System must reject package and emit structured error with remediation hint

scenarios.name: Epoch conflict during migration
scenarios.invariant: Saga compensation must execute; no partial state left behind

scenarios.name: Tampered evidence during fault injection
scenarios.invariant: Verifier must reject replay and flag tamper in structured log

scenarios.name: Poisoned global prior in federation
scenarios.invariant: Local topology evidence must override poisoned prior

scenarios.name: Replay attack during incident propagation
scenarios.invariant: Anti-replay framing must detect and reject; quarantine unaffected

scenarios.name: Stale evidence in release aggregation
scenarios.invariant: Release gate must reject stale verdicts outside epoch window

scenarios.name: Credential expiry during publication
scenarios.invariant: Distribution must block; no package published without valid credential
